transportAdvice: Albuquerque has a public bus and rapid transit system that connects major areas, though coverage can be limited for some tourist sites; renting a car is often the most practical option for exploring the city and surrounding region. Taxis and ride-hail services are available, and the historic Old Town and downtown areas are walkable once you arrive.

weather.description: Cold and dry winter days with occasional overnight frost and clear sunny skies.
Still cool but days begin to warm slightly with continued dry and sunny conditions.
Mild and pleasant with increasing warmth, though windy conditions are common this month.
Warm spring days with low humidity and frequent wind, making it a comfortable time to explore outdoors.
Hot and dry with long sunny days and very little rainfall, ideal for sightseeing.
Very hot and dry before the monsoon season begins, with intense afternoon sun.
Monsoon season brings afternoon and evening thunderstorms that offer brief relief from the heat.
Continued monsoon activity with warm temperatures and regular afternoon thundershowers.
Monsoon season winds down, temperatures become more comfortable, and skies begin to clear.
Crisp and pleasant autumn weather with cool nights and warm days, one of the best months to visit.
Cooling rapidly with cold nights and mild afternoons under mostly clear skies.
Cold winter conditions return with frosty nights and short but often sunny days.
